name: International Conference on Oil, Gas and Petroleum Engineering
content: We take immense pleasure in inviting you to attend the “International Conference on Oil, Gas and Petroleum Engineering” which is slated during October 21-22, 2022 at Orlando, Florida, USA. IOGP- 2022 which runs with theme “Shaping world’s energy through latest trends in oil, gas and petroleum”. The latitude of IOGP-2022 is to bring the advancements in the domain of petroleum, natural gas, reservoir engineering and its allied areas. The conference was commence with an opening decorum followed by a series of the speech delivered by both estimable delegates and members of the Keynote forum and speakers
